game.name: Somewhere, A Cat Sleeps
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 색상 대체, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Between the veil of night and dawn, a cat once loved still wanders on. A meditative walking simulator about cats, patience, love, and loss.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Between the veil of night and dawn, a cat once loved still wanders on. A meditative walking simulator about cats, patience, love, and loss.
